name: BetterBasket
headline: The only all-in-one pricing system for grocers
description: BetterBasket helps grocers with pricing, powered by competitive data. Our founding team worked together at Uber Eats growing the dark store business in Asia to $100 million in revenue and making it profitable, and are now building BetterBasket to bring those learnings to all grocers.
tags: industry:b2b; industry:analytics; industry:food-&-beverage; industry:retail; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Leon Zhang, Founder
founders.description: BetterBasket CEO; ex-Uber Eats, PIMCO, Wharton MBA dropout and UChicago BS '17

founders.name: Vagelis Viskadouros, Founder
founders.description: BetterBasket Founder, ex-Uber Eats Data Scientist, Ecole Polytechnique MSc in Data Science for Business

generated_description:
**BetterBasket** is an innovative startup focused on bringing an all-in-one pricing solution to the grocery industry. Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's W24 batch, this young company operates out of San Francisco with a small but determined team of four folks. Its mission is profoundly straightforward: to provide grocers with advanced pricing strategies powered by competitive data.

The founding team is not new to the game. Having previously worked at Uber Eats to propel the dark store business in Asia to $100 million in revenue, they've learned valuable lessons that they are now channeling into BetterBasket. They understand that in an age where grocery prices are escalating—sparking concern among 90% of Americans—effective pricing strategies are more crucial than ever.

BetterBasket’s offerings include **competitive data analysis**, **pricing optimization**, and **digital price tags**, designed to help grocers automate and enhance their pricing strategies effectively. Picture it: real-time tracking of prices and product assortments, allowing businesses to stay ahead of the competition and potentially unlock up to 8% more revenue or margin. This is all achieved through advanced AI algorithms that automate the tedious work of updating price tags—freeing up time for staff to focus on enhancing customer experiences instead.

In addition to its innovative solutions, BetterBasket is committed to providing resources and insights to the grocery industry. They’re keen on not just helping individual grocers, but also improving overall market efficiency.

Nicolas Dessaigne serves as a group partner, guiding this ambitious venture. With its strong analytical backbone and a vision to transform grocery pricing, BetterBasket is certainly a company to watch.

For anyone in the grocery business looking to modernize their pricing strategies and keep up with the fast-changing market landscape, BetterBasket might just have the answer. Visit [BetterBasket's website](http://betterbasket.ai) to learn more about how they can help revolutionize grocery pricing.
